author: C1346TTdonnal
title: Family trip to check out the Academy of Dramatic Arts
text: Keep up the good quality of training with your staff. I would recommend The Chandler to anyone who is considering traveling to New York City. New York is an exciting and interesting city with several things to do. You have to really pick and chose what you really have time to visit and it gives you reason to return.
